thread.title: SC declares all SPSC exams from 2013-16 ?null and void?
thread.title_full: SC declares all SPSC exams from 2013-16 ?null and void?

title: SC declares all SPSC exams from 2013-16 ?null and void?
text:
SC declares all SPSC exams from 2013-16 ‘null and void’ | APS Peshawar student grabs top position in matriculation exams 
ISLAMABAD: The Supreme Court on Monday declared all examinations conducted by the Sindh Public Service Commission (SPSC) from 2013 to 2016 ‘null and void’. 
Announcing its suo moto decision relating to SPSC, the apex court ruled that all exams organised by the body from 2013-16 stand ‘null and void’ and candidates who appeared in the exams during this period will need to retake the exams. 
Around 27,000 candidates had sat for the SPSC exams within this period. Of these, 664 candidates had cleared the written exam while 227 had passed both the written exam and interview.
